revised_title: Scattering of Electrons by Atoms: A Study of the Motion of Electrons in Static Fields of Hydrogen and Helium
tldr: The authors investigate the motion of electrons in the static fields of hydrogen and helium atoms, focusing on the scattering of electrons by atoms. They compare the Born approximation with experimental results and discuss the importance of considering the distortion of the incident wave by the atom in explaining the scattering behavior of slow electrons.
